title: CA Final May 2026 Exams: Mock Test Papers Series I & II Announced by ICAI!
content:
# CA Final May 2026 Exams: Mock Test Papers Series I & II Announced by ICAI!

Ek important update hai CA Final students ke liye! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ke Board of Studies (Academic) ne May 2026 examinations ke liye Mock Test Papers (MTP) Series I aur Series II release karne ka announcement kiya hai. Yeh announcement January 27, 2026 ko hua hai, jo students ko exam-like conditions mein prepare karne mein help karega.

Here are the key details:

*   **For Whom:** CA Final students preparing for the May 2026 examinations.
*   **Announcement By:** Board of Studies (Academic), ICAI.
*   **Announcement Date:** January 27, 2026.
*   **Formats Available:** Mock tests will be available in both physical and virtual modes.
*   **MTP Series I:** Scheduled to commence on March 16, 2026, with a detailed paper-wise schedule available.
*   **MTP Series II:** Will begin on April 1, 2026, providing an additional opportunity for students to evaluate their readiness.

Students ko strongly advice kiya jaa raha hai ki woh in MTPs ko seriously attempt karein to get maximum benefit and boost their confidence.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://bos.icai.org/)

*Published on: 29 January 2026*
